<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Miriel Grayleaf](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2468)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 7

**Perception** +2; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +5, [Library Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +5, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** -1

**Int** +3

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (10 bolts), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 13 

**Fort** +1 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +4 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 5

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +2 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +5 ([range 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8 piercing

**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 15, attack +7
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
- **1st**
[Grease](/Spells.aspx?ID=140)

</column>
